column2: it's the Burbank Strip - with fun little shops, restaurants and lots of parking
column3: I have been coming here for years - I did not know it now had a name = Iconic Village - over the years it has become more trendy with cool little shops, now Gluten free shop, Rocket FIzz for old candies, an outlet for antique looking jewelry , whose name escapes me - far cheaper than at department stores; the iconic Porto's bakery is on the corner.Across the road, on the other side of Hollywood Way is my new favorite Chinese Foot massage place - the Golden something...
